document.full_text: jury selection began on monday in the manslaughter trial of three construction supervisors accused in the deaths of two firefighters in a blaze at the former deutsche bank building in lower manhattan.
document.title: trial stemming from deadly deutsche bank fire begins
lines_and_colors: jury selection began on monday in the manslaughter trial of three construction supervisors accused in the deaths of two firefighters in a blaze at the former deutsche bank building in lower manhattan.
